promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive legendary ibex dark-type pokemon with violet hypnotic antlers. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Necrocero, a a massive legendary ibex dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Feather. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "dark" or "Necrocero". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, ibex-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Necrocero: A colossal crypt-dweller with ebony antlers, capable of summoning shadowy plumage. Elusive in nature, it's said to shield lost souls within its horns.
